column1: ap 10:30|"half past ten"|"ii. After his unexpected tea-party
column2: Bilbo slept late the following morning. In consequence
column3: he didn’t get the dwarves’ letter until half past ten – and had ten minutes to meet them at eleven o’clock at the Green Dragon Inn
column4: Bywater. ‘Bilbo could never remember how he found himself outside … running as fast as his furry feet could carry him.’ (H
column5: p. 33)"|"Bilbo's Last Song"|"J. R. R. Tolkien"

column1: ap 11:00|"eleven o’clock"|"ii. After his unexpected tea-party
column2: Bilbo slept late the following morning. In consequence
